message:
“'3 Western states have landed their “special forces troops in Cyrinacia & are now setting up bases & training centres” to reinforce rebel forces who are resisting pro-Qaddafi forces.... Western forces are reportedly preparing to set up training bases for local militias... for an effective control of the oil-rich region & counter any push by pro-Qaddafi forces from Tripoli."

http://pakobserver.net/detailnews.asp?id=78009
